instruction: Design a survey to assess customer satisfaction with an online retail company.
output:
Design a survey to assess customer satisfaction with Amazon:
The survey should include a combination of Likert-scale and open-ended questions in order to gauge customers' overall satisfaction with Amazon. Questions should address the website's user experience, selection of items, customer service, delivery speed, and return policy. Additionally, it should also include questions regarding any areas for improvement that customers would like to see. Furthermore, the survey should provide customers with an opportunity to explain why they feel satisfied or dissatisfied with the company.
